<h1>Questions 2/5</h1>

<p>Please select how strongly you agree or disagree with each statement below, from 'Strongly Agree' to 'Strongly Disagree'.</p>

<br>
<br>

#macro( tablerows $label $var $test )
#if ( $test )
    #set( $bg = "#FFFFFF" )
    #set( $test = false )
#else
    #set( $bg = "#D2D2D2" )
    #set( $test = true )
#end    
<tr>
  <td bgcolor="$bg">$label
  #if ( $error.get($var) )
  <br><font color='#ff0000;'>Please answer this question.</font>
  #end
  </td>  <td></td>
  #foreach ( $col in [1..10])
    <td  bgcolor="$bg"><input type='radio' name='$var' value='$col' 
 #if ( $data.getLong( $var ) == $col )
   CHECKED="CHECKED"
#end   
    >
    </td>
  #end
</tr>
#end

<table border='0'>
 <tr>
   <td width='50%'></td>  <td></td>
   <td width='10%' colspan='2'>
strongly agree
  </td>
     <td width='30%' colspan='6'>
  </td>
   <td  width='10%' colspan='2' align='right' >
strongly disagree
  </td>
  </tr>
#tablerows( "When I'm in a new and unfamiliar situation, I am always optimistic that things will work out for me (in other words, I feel and think that things will be OK)." "opt01")
#tablerows( "I often find myself doing things that I know, at the time I choose to do them, I will regret later." "opt02")
#tablerows( "When I expect that good things are going to happen to me in the future, I feel better about myself." "opt03")
#tablerows( "When I get disappointed about something, it makes me feel that I'm to blame, because I should have known better in the first place and not expected as much." "opt04")
#tablerows( "I always try to be cautious when I approach new and unfamiliar situations, in case something goes wrong." "opt05")
#tablerows( "I prefer to have low expectations of the future since that way I might be pleasantly surprised, and I'm protected from being disappointed." "opt06")
</table>
